PCS.PCSCore

类 PCSCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppKickstarter.misc.AppThread
      • PCS.PCSCore.PCSCore
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class PCSCore
extends AppThread
    PCSCore CLass Connected ALL Handlers
    作者:
    Chuanyang Zheng(17251311), Pan Feng (19205945), Gong Yikai (17251567), ZHANG YIJIA (17251281)

      • exitTimeCoefficient

        private long exitTimeCoefficient
        Exit Time=Insert Cart Time + exitTimeCoefficient. If necessary, change it in PCS.cfg

      • calculateFeeCoefficient

        private float calculateFeeCoefficient
        Calculating Parking Fee. If necessary, change it in PCS.cfg

      • gateOpenWaitTime

        private int gateOpenWaitTime
        The time gate starting closing after opening. If necessary, open it in PCS.cfg

      • gateOpenTime

        private int gateOpenTime
        The time gate using to open. If necessary, open it in PCS.cfg

      • totalFloorNumber

        private int totalFloorNumber
        The number of floors. If necessary, open it in PCS.cfg

        private int[] availableParkingSpaces
        Number of available parking spaces in each floor

        The number of pay machines

      • PCSCore

        public PCSCore(java.lang.String id,
               AppKickstarter appKickstarter)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        PCS Core Constructor
        参数:
        id - The ID Of the PCS Core. By Default, the ID is PCSCore
        appKickstarter - appKickstarter
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - throws Exception

    • 方法详细资料

      • run

        public void run()
        Get Handler boxes and Process Logic Message. The most important method of PCSCore

      • checkStringToInt

        public boolean checkStringToInt(java.lang.String detail)
        Check whether the String can be converted to int or not
        参数:
        detail - The String that tried to be converted to int
        返回:
        If the String can be converted to int, return true. ELse, return false

      • PayStateUpdate

        public void PayStateUpdate(java.lang.String PID,
                           java.lang.String TicketID)
        参数:
        PID - is the Paymachine ID
        TicketID - is the Ticket ID Set the Paymachine ID to this ticket

      • SendTicketFee

        public void SendTicketFee(Msg msg)
        A Function to send the TicketFee
        参数:
        msg:The - received message Find the specified Ticket Calculated the current Fee of that ticket Send the Fee to the Paymachine

      • SendExitInfo

        public void SendExitInfo(Msg msg)
        A Function to send the EXit Information
        参数:
        msg:The - received message Find the specified Ticket and send the exitinfo to paymachine handler

      • AddTicket

        public void AddTicket()
        Add Ticket to ticket List

      • handleCollectorValidRequest

        public void handleCollectorValidRequest(Msg msg)
        Process Collector Valid a ticket request. If the ticket is valid, tell Collector that the ticket is valid, and tell exit gate to open. Also, set a timer to tell exit gate to close after a defined period
        参数:
        msg - Msg received from Collector

      • handleTimesUp

        private void handleTimesUp(Msg msg)
        Handle Timer wake up
        参数:
        msg - Message receive from Timer

      • FindTicketByID

        public int FindTicketByID(int TargetID)
        A Function to search a ticket by TicketID
        参数:
        TargetID:The - Ticket ID
        返回:
        If one ticket has the TargetID, return the position index of the Ticket in the TicketList. Else, return -1

        public boolean validTicket(int ticketID)

        参数:
        msg - Contain Message From Motion Sensor Detect Up

        Handle Motion Sensor Detect Down
        参数:

      • handleParkingSpaceChange

        public void handleParkingSpaceChange(int initial,
                                     int now)
        Handle Available Parking Spaces change.
        参数:
        initial:the - floor number will decrease one available parking spaces
        now: - the floor number will increase one available parking space

        参数:

        返回:
